ygData.subject: RE: Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: when you are loaded down it is your AGI that is lowered... not your dex.... Just thought ya might want to know that Jaxim
ygData.messageBody:
when you are loaded down it is your AGI that is lowered... not your dex....

Just thought ya might want to know that


Jaxim



>From: Ralph Carothers <CarothersR@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
>Date: Mon, 13 Sep 1999 13:49:36 -0400
>
>and yes....the SSOL's cleanse is an EFFECT....an effect is NOT coupled with
>charges. And dex means SQUAT...its a rumor. I've had the SSOL go off
>constantly when burdened by Equipment than any other time. (same goes for
>the screaming mace) The mace SHOULD have charges according to the
>quest.....not my "own" ideas.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Ralph Carothers [mailto:CarothersR@...]
>Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 1:48 PM
>To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
>
>
>
>Try to use it....ummm dude, you dont even know that I've been using it
>SINCE
>IT CAME OUT....before you go about being an ass.....READ WHAT IT SAYS IN
>THE
>QUEST. Read and you might learn what I stated: The SSOL seems to be
>BROKEN....the quest says one thing....the weapon and its description say
>another.....I'd say that is BROKEN. A typo is the process of messing up
>SPELLING or grammar.....they COMPLETELY MISWORDED THE DESCRIPTION. They
>didnt go and say: It will cleanse you of all illnesses....it says it will
>give to you a strength that slowly drains you (or something close to that.)
>and that the woman behind the counter can refresh the charge. How the HELL
>is that a typo dude?
>
>Why dont you learn to chill before trying to put the smack down and READ.
>I'd suggest doing the quest before you tell others something.
>
>
>Bann
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: I. G [ mailto:shadowtg1@... <mailto:shadowtg1@...> ]
>Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 1:41 PM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
>
>
>From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>
>
>yes and since the weapon does not have any thing that requires CHARGES I
>disregarded it as a typo/ something that is no installed at this time...
>there for not important!
>
>The cleanes effect is just like the Tommy effect that it is based off your
>dex and has UNLIMITED 'charges'. As of right now there is no need to
>'recharge' the SSoL.
>
>Sorry. Try using the weapon before you try to smack on someone.
>
>Jaxim
>
>
>

> >

> >
> >charges??? Hmmm odd.. I know for a fact that my SSoL has gone of a TON.
>As
>
> >for cleanes... it removes poison and disease from ya ... sometimes it
>take
> >a
> >
> >couple of cleanes to remove them though.
> >
> >
> >Jaxim
> >

> > >From: "Anne Falbo-Ortiz" <topaaz_ladyjay@...>
> > >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > >Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
> > >Date: Mon, 13 Sep 1999 11:16:49 EDT
> > >
> > >From: "Anne Falbo-Ortiz" <topaaz_ladyjay@...>
> > >
> > >Clerics have a hard time doing the quest? LOL i am a human cleric and
> >had
> > >no troule doing said quest, in fact it was one of the easier ones i
>have
> > >done. Now for my question, what exactly does clense do? I was under
>the
>
> > >impression that it took of negitive effects on the player, tho it
>always
> > >seems to clense me when i dont need it, and there are only 30 charges
>on
> > >it.
> > > I have no clue how to get it recharged. I am a lvl 24 cleric on
> >Xegony,
> > >and am now using a screaming mace which i perfer, the SSoL was nice,
> >fast,
> > >and consistant in the amount of damg it did, but the effect was wasted
>on
>
> > >my
> > >toon as i never seem to get many neg effects on me. Suffice it to say
>I
> > >gave my SSoL to a noobie that was begging, LOL he loved it and i was
> >happy
> > >to help, as far as what it is worth, i have no clue as i would pay
> >nothing
> > >over 20p for it and thats going above the value to me. It's prob worth
> > >alot
> > >to ppl who want them badly and less to others that don't. just INHO,
> >stay
> > >safe and have fun
> > >
> > >

> > >>The SSoL is a funny thing. It is probably worth more than it seems.
> > >>Similar
> > >>weapons for pure casters (e.g. Water Crystal staff) I've seen selling
> >for
> > >>100pp+. The SSoL is basically a mediocre weapon, but with a pretty
> >useful
> > >>effect. Many clerics cannot do the quest (or don't want to spend time
> > >>building faction). To them, it may be fairly desirable.
> > >>
> > >>I traded my first one to a lvl 30 Teir'dal cleric in return for a pair
> >of
> > >>crested spaulders (AC11, +6sta), and I think I got the better deal. So
>I
>
> > >>would say: make your way over to East Commons or Nektulos and you may
> >get
> > >>a
> > >>good price.
> > >>
> > >>Elbeno

> > >>Bristlebane
